name: Perler Art
caption: The large perler pieces I've made over the years. Top left is Ramona Flowers, top right is Rezz, and bottom is Mega Gengar but in the nonbinary flag colors. I'm not 100% certain where I got the pattern for Ramona, but my best guess is this pattern. The other two designs I made myself based on the sources I'm referencing.

name: Black Hole Lunch
caption: Result of me getting stumped trying to come up with backgrounds for these webpages and just doodling instead. At least now I've got a sparkly gif on the site. This (like much of the rest of the site) is actually done in the original 16-color palette from win95/98.

name: Self-Portrait
caption: I'm actually really proud of this; this is my first time making something with this kinda detail and I've been struggling to get that drawing style of hair down for YEARS.

name: Cones
caption: What happens when you start to make an icon for your website and get distracted. Honestly the way the magenta lines interact with the dither pattern messes with my head a little.

name: Extradimensional Butterfly Collection
caption: What happens when you start to make an icon for your website and get distracted a second time. I was gonna make a bluesky link but the filters in aseprite were too shiny.

name: D20
caption: Just a random die I decided to make once.
